GDG Abomey-Calavi in collaboration with GDG Cotonou presents DevFest B√©nin

GDG Development Festival is a all-day developer conference that offers speaker sessions across multiple product areas, codelabs, hackathon and more!

AGENDA:

events.name: GOOGLE #HASH CODE 2018
events.description:
Register today at g.co/hashcode! and choose your hub : Cotonou with GDG Cotonou

Think you have what it takes to optimize video serving on YouTube? Or how about routing a Google Street View car through a busy city?

Step into the shoes of a Google engineer during Hash Code, a team programming competition that tasks students and professionals across Europe, the Middle East and Africa with solving a real Google engineering problem. Are you up for the challenge?
‚Äã The competition is divided into two stages:

an Online Qualification Round on 1st March 18:30 CET

For this round, your team can participate from wherever you‚Äôd like, including one of our Hash Code hubs. Hubs allow for teams in the same location (eg. city or university) to compete side-by-side in an even more fun and exciting environment.

a Final Round on 28th April

Top scoring teams from the Online Qualification Round will be invited to Google Dublin to compete in the Final Round of the competition.

events.name: Cloud Study Jam by GDG Cotonou
events.description:
-Learn how to set up development and production environments in the Cloud.

-Learn how Docker and Kubernetes work, or learn how to process Big Data in the Cloud.

-Get access to Qwiklabs.com, a Google training tool, free of charge (a $70+ value).

-Get Google-hosted badges for their online profiles, to show potential employers what they know about Cloud computing.
